name: CLAMS wrapper for spaCy NLP
description: Apply spaCy NLP to all text documents in a MMIF file.

parameters.name: pretokenized
parameters.description: Boolean parameter to set the app to use existing tokenization, if available, for text documents for NLP processing. Useful to process ASR documents, for example.

name: Whisper Wrapper
description: A CLAMS wrapper for Whisper-based ASR software originally developed by OpenAI.

name: AAPB-PUA Kaldi Wrapper
description: A CLAMS wrapper for Kaldi-based ASR software originally developed by PopUpArchive and hipstas, and later updated by Kyeongmin Rim at Brandeis University. Wrapped software can be found at https://github.com/brandeis-llc/aapb-pua-kaldi-docker .

parameters.name: use_speech_segmentation
parameters.description: When true, the app looks for existing TimeFrame { "frameType": "speech" } annotations, and runs ASR only on those frames, instead of entire audio files.

name: Whisper Wrapper
description: A CLAMS wrapper for Whisper-based ASR software originally developed by OpenAI.

name: Brandeis ACS Wrapper
description: Brandeis Acoustic Classification & Segmentation (ACS) is a audio segmentation tool developed at Brandeis Lab for Linguistics and Computation. The original software can be found at https://github.com/brandeis-llc/acoustic-classification-segmentation .

name: AAPB-PUA Kaldi Wrapper
description: A CLAMS wrapper for Kaldi-based ASR software originally developed by PopUpArchive and hipstas, and later updated by Kyeongmin Rim at Brandeis University. Wrapped software can be found at https://github.com/brandeis-llc/aapb-pua-kaldi-docker .

parameters.name: use_speech_segmentation
parameters.description: When true, the app looks for existing TimeFrame { "frameType": "speech" } annotations, and runs ASR only on those frames, instead of entire audio files.

name: Slate Detection
description: This tool detects slates.

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: Unit for output typeframe

parameters.name: sampleRatio
parameters.description: Frequency to sample frames.

parameters.name: stopAt
parameters.description: Frame number to stop processing

parameters.name: stopAfterOne
parameters.description: When True, processing stops after first timeframe is found

parameters.name: minFrameCount
parameters.description: Minimum number of frames required for a timeframe to be included in the output

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Threshold from 0-1, lower accepts more potential slates.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: pick a scene detector algorithm, see http://scenedetect.com/projects/Manual/en/latest/cli/detectors.html

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: threshold value to use in the detection algorithm. Note that the meaning of this numerical value differs for different detector algorithms.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: Whisper Wrapper
description: A CLAMS wrapper for Whisper-based ASR software originally developed by OpenAI.

parameters.name: modelSize
parameters.description: The size of the model to use. Can be "tiny", "base", "small", "medium", or "large".

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: pick a scene detector algorithm, see http://scenedetect.com/projects/Manual/en/latest/cli/detectors.html

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: threshold value to use in the detection algorithm. Note that the meaning of this numerical value differs for different detector algorithms.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: EAST Text Detection
description: OpenCV-based text localization app that used EAST text detection model. Please visit the source code repository for full documentation.

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: Unit for time points in the output. Only works with VideoDocument input.

parameters.name: frameType
parameters.description: Segments of video to run on. Only works with VideoDocument input and TimeFrame input. Empty value means run on the every frame types.

parameters.name: sampleRatio
parameters.description: Frequency to sample frames. Only works with VideoDocument input, and without TimeFrame input. (when `TimeFrame` annotation is found, this parameter is ignored.)

parameters.name: stopAt
parameters.description: Frame number to stop running. Only works with VideoDocument input. The default is roughly 2 hours of video at 30fps.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: Bars Detection
description: This tool detects SMPTE color bars.

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: Unit for output typeframe.

parameters.name: sampleRatio
parameters.description: Frequency to sample frames.

parameters.name: stopAt
parameters.description: Frame number to stop processing.

parameters.name: stopAfterOne
parameters.description: When True, processing stops after first timeframe is found.

parameters.name: minFrameCount
parameters.description: minimum number of frames required for a timeframe to be included in the output.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Threshold from 0-1, lower accepts more potential slates.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: Parseq OCR Wrapper
description: This tool applies Parseq OCR to a video or image and generates text boxes and OCR results.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: Parseq OCR Wrapper
description: This tool applies Parseq OCR to a video or image and generates text boxes and OCR results.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: Dbpedia Spotlight Wrapper
description: Apply named entity linking to all text documents in a MMIF file.

parameters.name: confidence
parameters.description: disambiguation confidence score for linking

parameters.name: support
parameters.description: resource prominence, i.e. number of in-links in Wikipedia (lower bound)

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: limits recognition to certain types of named entities, e.g. DBpedia:Place

parameters.name: policy
parameters.description: (whitelist) selects all entities of the same type; (blacklist) selects all entities not of the same type

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: CLAMS wrapper for spaCy NLP
description: Apply spaCy NLP to all text documents in a MMIF file.

parameters.name: pretokenized
parameters.description: Boolean parameter to set the app to use existing tokenization, if available, for text documents for NLP processing. Useful to process ASR documents, for example.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: Tone_Detector
description: Detects spans of monotonic audio within an audio file

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: the unit for annotation output

parameters.name: lengthThreshold
parameters.description: minimum length threshold (in ms)

parameters.name: sampleSize
parameters.description: length for each segment of samples to be compared

parameters.name: stopAt
parameters.description: stop point for audio processing (in ms). Defaults to the length of the file

parameters.name: tolerance
parameters.description: threshold value for a "match" within audio processing

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: Gentle Forced Aligner Wrapper
description: This CLAMS app aligns transcript and audio track using Gentle. Gentle is a robust yet lenient forced aligner built on Kaldi.This app only works when Gentle is already installed locally.Unfortunately, Gentle is not distributed as a Python package distribution.To get Gentle installation instruction, see https://lowerquality.com/gentle/ Make sure install Gentle from the git commit specified in ``analyzer_version`` in this metadata.

parameters.name: use_speech_segmentation
parameters.description: When set true, use exising "speech"-typed ``TimeFrame`` annotations and run aligner only on those frames, instead of entire audio files.

parameters.name: use_tokenization
parameters.description: When set true, ``Alignment`` annotation output will honor existing latest tokenization (``Token`` annotations). Due to a limitation of the way Kaldi reads in English tokens, existing tokens must not contain whitespaces.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

name: Chyron Detection
description: This tool detects chyrons, generates time segments.

parameters.name: timeUnit
parameters.description: unit for output timeframe

parameters.name: sampleRatio
parameters.description: Frequency to sample frames

parameters.name: minFrameCount
parameters.description: Minimum number of frames required for a timeframe to be included

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Threshold from 0-1, lower accepts more potential chyrons

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation
